item.title: You Won't Believe How Easy It Is To Make This Delicious Slow Cooker Coq Au Vin Recipe!
item.description: Introduction Coq au vin is a classic French dish made with chicken, bacon, mushrooms, and red wine. It’s a hearty meal that’s perfect for a cozy night in. Plus, it’s surprisingly easy to make! This slow cooker version of the recipe is even easier, and it’s sure to become a family favorite. Benefits of Slow Cooking Slow cooking is a great way to make delicious meals with minimal effort. All you need to do is throw the ingredients into the slow cooker, set it and forget it.
